name: Lust
passiveSkills: Immune to Crave, Heal Reduction and Heal Block effects, including Silver and Innate effects
Heal self for 100% of all damage dealt
Permanently Increase ATK and MAGIC on self by +25% if Perfect Hit effects, including Golden and Innate effects, are active on self at the start of battle and at the start of your turn
Your first action each turn deals 300% Increased Damage if Blind or Accuracy Down effects, including Silver and Innate effects, are active on self at the start of battle and at the start of your turn
50% Chance to inflict Blind on self for 1 turn when you take damage
50% Chance to inflict Blinding Burn all enemies for 3 turns when you take damage.
